column2: Verify user can add item to cart
column3: 1. Navigate to product page. 2. Click 'Add to Cart' button.
column4: Item should be added to the cart and a confirmation message displayed.
column5: Item was added to the cart and confirmation message displayed.

column3: 1. Click on the cart icon. 2. Check the items listed in the cart.
column4: Cart should display all items added by the user.

column2: Verify user can remove item from cart
column3: 1. Navigate to cart. 2. Click 'Remove' next to an item.
column4: Item should be removed from the cart and the cart updated accordingly.
column5: Item was removed and cart updated correctly.

column3: 1. Click on the logo. 2. Observe the page redirection.
column4: User should be redirected to the home page.
column5: User was redirected to the home page successfully.

column2: Verify user can proceed to checkout
column3: 1. Navigate to cart. 2. Click 'Proceed to Checkout' button.
column4: User should be taken to the checkout page.
column5: User was taken to the checkout page successfully.

column3: 1. Navigate to cart with no items. 2. Observe the message displayed.
column4: A message indicating the cart is empty should be displayed.

column2: Verify user can navigate to product details from cart
column3: 1. Navigate to cart. 2. Click on a product name.
column4: User should be redirected to the product details page.
column5: User was redirected to the product details page successfully.

column2: Verify navigation back to previous page
column3: 1. Navigate to a product page. 2. Click 'Back' button.
column4: User should return to the previous page.
column5: User returned to the previous page successfully.
